languages.text: Ваше тело истерзано жестокими пытками и пребывает на грани смерти. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами, но с некоторым количеством стимуляторов вы сможете продержаться достаточно долго, чтобы найти более действенное решение.

Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.
languages.original_text: Ваше тело истерзано жестокими пытками и пребывает на грани смерти. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами, но с некоторым количеством стимуляторов вы сможете продержаться достаточно долго, чтобы найти более действенное решение.

traits.locale_text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You're on the verge of death.

Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.
Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You're on the verge of death.
Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death.
Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death.

Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.

languages.text: 残酷な拷問によって身体はズタズタにされた。あなたは死の危機に瀕している。 通常の方法では取り除けないが、十分な鎮静剤があれば、より効果的な解決策が見つかるまでの間、耐えることができるだろう。
languages.original_text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.

traits.locale_text: 残酷な拷問によって身体はズタズタにされた。あなたは死の危機に瀕している。 通常の方法では取り除けないが、十分な鎮静剤があれば、より効果的な解決策が見つかるまでの間、耐えることができるだろう。

languages.text: 你的身体被残酷的折磨弄得血肉模糊，此刻处于死亡边缘。 此效果无法通过常规手段移除，但只要注射了足够多的兴奋剂，你就可以继续支撑下去，直到找到更加有效的治疗方法为止。
languages.original_text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.

traits.locale_text: 你的身体被残酷的折磨弄得血肉模糊，此刻处于死亡边缘。 此效果无法通过常规手段移除，但只要注射了足够多的兴奋剂，你就可以继续支撑下去，直到找到更加有效的治疗方法为止。

languages.text: La cruel tortura ha destrozado tu cuerpo. Estás al borde de la muerte. No puede eliminarse por medios convencionales, pero, con suficientes estimulantes, podrás soportarlo hasta encontrar una solución mejor.
languages.original_text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.

traits.locale_text: La cruel tortura ha destrozado tu cuerpo. Estás al borde de la muerte. No puede eliminarse por medios convencionales, pero, con suficientes estimulantes, podrás soportarlo hasta encontrar una solución mejor.

languages.text: Dein Körper wird von einer grausamen Folter verstümmelt. Du stehst an der Schwelle des Todes.Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden. Hast du genügend Stimulanzien, hältst du allerdings lange genug durch, um eine Lösung zu finden.
languages.original_text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.

traits.locale_text: Dein Körper wird von einer grausamen Folter verstümmelt. Du stehst an der Schwelle des Todes.Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden. Hast du genügend Stimulanzien, hältst du allerdings lange genug durch, um eine Lösung zu finden.

languages.text: Votre corps est à la torture. La mort est proche. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires, mais avec suffisamment de stimulants, vous pourrez survivre le temps de trouver une solution plus efficace.
languages.original_text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.

traits.locale_text: Votre corps est à la torture. La mort est proche. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires, mais avec suffisamment de stimulants, vous pourrez survivre le temps de trouver une solution plus efficace.

languages.text: Acımasız eziyet, bedenini ezip mahvetti. Ölümün eşiğindesin. Normal yollarla kaldırılamaz. Yeterli sayıda stimülan ile daha etkili bir çözüm bulmana yetecek kadar dayanman mümkün olabilir.
languages.original_text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms, you will be able to bear it just long enough to find a more efficient solution.

traits.locale_text: Acımasız eziyet, bedenini ezip mahvetti. Ölümün eşiğindesin. Normal yollarla kaldırılamaz. Yeterli sayıda stimülan ile daha etkili bir çözüm bulmana yetecek kadar dayanman mümkün olabilir.

languages.text: Your body is mangled by cruel torture. You are on the verge of death. Cannot be removed by regular means, but with enough stimms you can bear it long enough to find a more permanent solution.
